giveCardToPLayer(Player) - Method in class groupOfCards.Deck
Gives a card from the deck to the player, when distributing or when a player has to pick one.
Graphic - package Graphic
Contains classes managing all graphic displays.
groupOfCards - package groupOfCards
Contains classes simulating a important group of cards in the game (except hands, witch are player's property)
